targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  ts AS "time",
  device_name AS metric,
  soc
FROM
  pylontech_bms
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ts)
ORDER BY
  ts

SELECT ts AS "time", device_name AS "Battery", b_status AS "Battery Status", v_status AS "BMS Voltage Status", c_status AS "BMS CurrentStatus", t_status AS "BMS Temperature Status" FROM pylontech_bms WHERE (device_name, ts) IN (SELECT device_name, MAX(ts) FROM pylontech_bms GROUP BY device_name)
SELECT ts AS "time", device_name AS metric, soc FROM pylontech_bms WHERE $__timeFilter(ts) ORDER BY ts
SELECT ts AS "time", device_name AS metric, temperature FROM pylontech_bms WHERE $__timeFilter(ts) ORDER BY ts
SELECT ts AS "time", device_name AS metric, voltage FROM pylontech_bms WHERE $__timeFilter(ts) ORDER BY ts
SELECT ts AS "time", device_name AS metric, current FROM pylontech_bms WHERE $__timeFilter(ts) ORDER BY ts

SELECT
  ts AS "time",
  -grid_power AS "Grid Power",
  load_power AS "Load Power",
  inverter_dc_power AS "Inverter Power"
FROM
  conext_xw
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ts)
ORDER BY
  ts

SELECT inverter_status AS "Operation Mode",
 inverter_load_shave_status AS "Load Shave Status",
 inverter_grid_support_status AS "Grid Support Status",
 inverter_active_warnings_status AS "Active Warnings",
 inverter_active_faults_status AS "Active Faults"
FROM conext_xw
WHERE (ts) IN (SELECT MAX(ts) from conext_xw)

SELECT energy_load_month AS "Monthly Energy Used",
 energy_grid_month AS "Monthly Energy from Grid",
 energy_battery_month AS "Monthly Energy from Solar",
 battery_low_voltage AS "Battery Low Voltage  Cutout",
 battery_hysteresis AS "Battery Voltage Hysteresis" 
 FROM conext_xw
 WHERE (ts) IN (SELECT MAX(ts) FROM conext_xw)
SELECT ts AS "time", grid_power AS "Grid Power", load_power AS "Load Power", inverter_dc_power AS "Inverter Power" FROM conext_xw WHERE $__timeFilter(ts) ORDER BY ts

SELECT ts AS "time",
 grid_current AS "Grid AC Current",
  load_Current AS "Load AC Current",
   inverter_dc_current AS "Inverter DC Current"
FROM conext_xw WHERE $__timeFilter(ts) ORDER BY ts

SELECT ts AS "time",
 grid_voltage AS "Grid AC Voltage",
  load_voltage AS "Load AC Voltage"
FROM conext_xw WHERE $__timeFilter(ts) ORDER BY ts

SELECT
  device_name AS metric,
  dc_output_power AS "PV Power"
FROM
  conext_mppt
WHERE
  (device_name) IN ('MPPT: West')
  AND 
  (ts) IN (
    SELECT
      MAX(ts)
    FROM
      conext_mppt
  )

SELECT
  device_name AS metric,
  dc_output_power AS "PV Power"
FROM
  conext_mppt
WHERE
  (device_name) IN ('MPPT: East')
  AND 
  (ts) IN (
    SELECT
      MAX(ts)
    FROM
      conext_mppt
  )

SELECT device_name AS metric,
 mppt_status AS "Operation Mode",
 mppt_charger_status AS "Solar Charger Status",
 mppt_active_warnings_status AS "Active Warnings",
 mppt_active_faults_status AS "Active Faults"
FROM conext_mppt
WHERE (ts) IN (SELECT MAX(ts) from conext_mppt)

SELECT device_name AS metric,
 energy_pv_day AS "Daily Energy from PV",
 energy_pv_week AS "Weekly Energy from PV",
 energy_pv_month AS "Monthly Energy from PV",
 energy_pv_year AS "Yearly Energy from PV"
 FROM conext_mppt
 WHERE (ts) IN (SELECT MAX(ts) FROM conext_mppt)

SELECT ts AS "time",
 device_name AS metric,
 dc_output_power AS "MPPT: West"
FROM conext_mppt WHERE (device_name) IN ('MPPT: West') AND $__timeFilter(ts) ORDER BY ts

SELECT ts AS "time",
 device_name AS metric,
 dc_output_power AS "MPPT: East"
FROM conext_mppt WHERE (device_name) IN ('MPPT: East') AND $__timeFilter(ts) ORDER BY ts

SELECT
  ts AS "time",
  device_name AS metric,
  dc_input_voltage
FROM
  conext_mppt
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ts)
ORDER BY
  ts
